Arsenal Football Club is a professional men's football club based in Islington, London, England. Arsenal plays in the Premier League, the top flight of English football.
In 1886 munitions workers at the Royal Arsenal in Woolwich founded the club as Dial Square. In 1913, the club crossed the city to Arsenal Stadium in Highbury,
